Component¶

class model.component.Component(id_: Optional[str] = None, uri: Optional[str] = None, urn: Optional[str] = None, annotations=None, localRepresentation: Optional[model.representation.Representation] = None)¶

Bases: model.base.IdentifiableArtefact

A component is an abstract super class used to define qualitative and quantitative data and metadata items that belong to a Component List and hence a Structure. Component is refined through its sub-classes.

property concept_identity¶

Association to a Concept in a Concept Scheme that identifies and defines the semantic of the Component

property local_representation¶

Association to the Representation of the Component if this is different from the coreRepresentation of the Concept which the Component uses (ConceptUsage)

Dimension¶

class model.component.Dimension(id_: Optional[str] = None, uri: Optional[str] = None, urn: Optional[str] = None, annotations=None, localRepresentation: Optional[model.representation.Representation] = None, position: Optional[int] = None)¶

Bases: model.component.Component, SDMXThon.parsers.data_parser.DataParser

A metadata concept used (most probably together with other metadata concepts) to classify a statistical series, e.g. a statistical concept indicating a certain economic activity or a geographical reference area.

property position¶

Position of the Dimension in the DimensionList

TimeDimension¶

class model.component.TimeDimension¶

Bases: model.component.Dimension, SDMXThon.parsers.data_parser.DataParser

A metadata concept that identifies the component in the key structure that has the role of “time”.

MeasureDimension¶

class model.component.MeasureDimension¶

Bases: model.component.Dimension, SDMXThon.parsers.data_parser.DataParser

A statistical concept that identifies the component in the key structure that has an enumerated list of measures. This dimension has, as its representation the Concept Scheme that enumerates the measure concepts.

Attribute¶

class model.component.Attribute(id_: Optional[str] = None, uri: Optional[str] = None, urn: Optional[str] = None, annotations=None, localRepresentation: Optional[model.representation.Representation] = None, usageStatus: Optional[str] = None, relatedTo=None)¶

Bases: model.component.Component, SDMXThon.parsers.data_parser.DataParser

A characteristic of an object or entity.

property relatedTo¶

Association to a AttributeRelationship.

property usageStatus¶

Defines the usage status of the Attribute (Mandatory, Conditional)

PrimaryMeasure¶

class model.component.PrimaryMeasure¶

Bases: model.component.Component, SDMXThon.parsers.data_parser.DataParser

The metadata concept that is the phenomenon to be measured in a data set. In a data set the instance of the measure is often called the observation.
